name: The Light (itch) (NekotTheBrave, BecBrock)
description:
You and your loved one are joined in the linking of your hearts. Unfortunately your loved one is dying and to save them, you must journey to the center of the earth in order to find the Earth Oracles, your best hope to help your Other!

Control Instructions:

W: Forward

A/D: Sideways

S: Back

Space: Jump

F: Pick up your partner

Left mouse click: Attack

 Right mouse click: Repel enemies

Made for Chillenium Game Jam 2023.

Software:

Ableton, Audacity, Zbrush, Maya, Substance Painter, and Photoshop.

Game engine used is Unreal Engine 4.27.

Sound Effects from Freesound.org and reconfigured with Ableton.

Animations from Mixamo.

Created by Brent Corr, Becca Brockman, Nehal Haider, and Fernando Garcia-Cel
